summary: The documentary is about the covert CIA drone war. Through voices on both sides of this new technology, the film reveals crucial information about the drone war in Pakistan and offers unique insights into the nature of drone warfare.
cast: Brandon Bryant|Zubair Rehman|John Bellinger III|Mark Mazzetti|Chris Woods|Bryan Callahan|Clive Stafford Smith|Shahzad Akbar|Jonathan Landay|Hina Shamsi|Jay Carney|Imran Khan|Lawrence Wilkerson|Andy Von Flotow|Michael Haas|Rafiq Rehman|P.W. Singer|Missy Cummings|Andrew Feinstein|Ronald Arkin|Noor Behram|Ben Emmerson|Masood Khan|Mustafa Qadri|Letta Tayler|Sarah Knuckey|Anthony Dworkin|James Bamford|Rosa Brooks|Jesselyn Radack
title: Drone
